item.description:
we're heading back to the arb. a few students of forestry from the czech republic will be coming along with us to learn and appreciate the wonderful specimens in our neighborhood. join us.

we will be meeting at the OTHER entrance along centre st: from the main entrance, this one is further up centre st--towards west roxbury--a hundred yards past the greenhouse entrance and located on the left, opposite the faulkner hospital.

i'll try to make it more clear; maybe there's an online map.
item.how_to_find_us: my vehicle: red jeep with big wheels.
item.name: Arnold Arboretum and its remarkable trees (plus shrubs: they're awesome, too!)
